about.summary: Tools used by organizational researchers for the analysis of multilevel data. Includes four broad sets of tools. First, functions for estimating within-group agreement and reliability indices. Second, functions for manipulating multilevel and longitudinal (panel) data. Third, simulations for estimating power and generating multilevel data. Fourth, miscellaneous functions for estimating reliability and performing simple calculations and data transformations.

Tools used by organizational researchers for the analysis of multilevel data. Includes four broad sets of tools. First, functions for estimating within-group agreement and reliability indices. Second, functions for manipulating multilevel and longitudinal (panel) data. Third, simulations for estimating power and generating multilevel data. Fourth, miscellaneous functions for estimating reliability and performing simple calculations and data transformations.

name: r-multilevel
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.7' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-multilevel
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/multilevel_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/multilevel/multilevel_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b15c1f945d6600cf4efbe7fb40d1f6617bdfbd8e9d881923598d322bf0c04737

build:
  number: 3
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip  # [win]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-nlme

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-nlme

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('multilevel')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('multilevel')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/multilevel/index.html
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Tools used by organizational researchers for the analysis of multilevel data. Includes
    four broad sets of tools. First, functions for estimating within-group agreement
    and reliability indices. Second, functions for manipulating multilevel and longitudinal
    (panel) data. Third, simulations for estimating power and generating multilevel
    data. Fourth, miscellaneous functions for estimating reliability and performing
    simple calculations and data transformations.
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - thewchan

# Author: Paul Bliese [aut, cre], Gilad Chen [ctb], Patrick Downes [ctb], Donald Schepker [ctb], Jonas Lang [ctb]
# Maintainer: Paul Bliese <pdbliese@gmail.com>
# Depends: R (>= 3.5.0), nlme, MASS

First, functions for estimating within-group agreement and reliability indices. Second, functions for manipulating multilevel and longitudinal (panel) data. Third, simulations for estimating power and generating multilevel data. Fourth, miscellaneous functions for estimating reliability and performing simple calculations and data transformations.
